name: Outer Darkness
description:
Harness the power of eight different elements to cast spells and destroy the legion of darkness!

You are a lowly mage that has been cast to the Outer Darkness. Hordes of demons are seeking to destroy you. Become stronger by defeating foes and learning new spells and abilities. Take down evil bosses that lurk in the darkness and defeat the ruler of the Outer Darkness, the Blood King, in order to escape.

Clearing the game with one element unlocks the next element on the list. The following elements are at your disposal:

Ice
Fire
Water
Lightning
Earth
Wind
Light
Dark

Can you escape?
If not, there will there be weeping and gnashing of teeth...
